name: DREAMGEM
description:
A prequel to EYEGEM: https://doubletopgames.itch.io/eyegem

Use your dreamcatcher to harvest dreams and trade them for the primal gems.

Controls: WASD or arrow keys to move, Spacebar to navigate

Credits:

  • Palette: PICO-8
  • Music: https://opengameart.org/content/dream
  • Font: https://www.dafont.com/pt/retro-gaming.font
